QuestData.Title: Not Fit to Swarm
QuestData.Description: Newly hatched mantid have only two instincts: kill and feed. They turn on one another, devouring the weak and leaving the strongest to mature.$B$BThose hatched during a swarm - the swarmborn - are turned loose on our enemies instead.$B$BThe swarmborn in the Clutches of Shek'zeer have been tainted. They are born into shadows and nightmares. Driven by terror, not hunger.$B$BThey are not fit to swarm. They must be purged.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 30 Shek'zeer Swarmborn in the Clutches of Shek'zeer.
QuestData.CompletionText: Let me know if you want to be dropped into a sea of swarmborn. It would entertain me greatly.
QuestData.RewardText: Their eggs should have basked in the warmth of the sun and the song of a million wings for ten more years.$B$BThe Empress will pay for her crimes.
